name: You only DIE once (Edvcel)
description:
You Only DIE Once is a puzzle game made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam. The theme is "Only one".

You control several squares which are trapped in separate screens. Every one of them needs to collect the coin in their screen for you to proceed. If even a single square dies on a spike, every single one of them will die. The player can only Die once. Ghosts interact with objects differently, their controls are also unique.

Controls

 Change screens with: 1 2 3 4 5

Press Return to return to the menu.

Player

Move with: A D

Jump with: Spacebar

Double jump by jumping in mid-air

Ghost

Move freely with: W A S D
